name: vscode-oscript
description: Provides syntax checking and fixing, highlighting, autocompletion, hints, symbol outline, identifier recognition and renaming and other features for the OScript language in Visual Studio Code.

oscript.languageServer.enabled.description: Enables/disables the language server for the OScript language.

oscript.validation.enabled.description: Enables/disables syntax validation for the OScript language.

oscript.completion.enabled.description: Enables/disables item completion on typing for the OScript language.

oscript.hover.enabled.description: Enables/disables documentation hints on hover for the OScript language.

oscript.symbols.enabled.description: Enables/disables the symbol outline for the OScript language.

oscript.definition.enabled.description: Enables/disables locating definitions of identifiers in the OScript language.

oscript.references.enabled.description: Enables/disables finding references for identifiers in the OScript language.

oscript.rename.enabled.description: Enables/disables identifier renaming for the OScript language.

oscript.quickFixes.enabled.description: Enables/disables quick-fixes for recoverable syntax errors in the OScript language.

enumDescriptions: The new version notification will not be shown anymore.
The new version notification will be shown only with a new major version.
The new version notification will be shown only with a new minor version.
The new version notification will always be shown.
oscript.whatIsNew.change.description: Limits the "What Is New" announcement only if a part of the version number changes: "major.minor.patch".

enumDescriptions: Only errors will be printed on the console.
Errors and warnings will be printed on the console.
Errors, warnings and debug messages will be printed on the console.
oscript.logging.level.description: Sets the level of problem tracking messages that appear in the debug output.

scripts.convert:syntax: mkdir -p dist && js-yaml pkg/syntaxes/oscript.configuration.yaml > dist/oscript.configuration.json && js-yaml pkg/syntaxes/oscript.tmLanguage.yaml > dist/oscript.tmLanguage.json
scripts.convert: npm run convert:syntax && npm run convert:api
scripts.compile: npm run compile:server && npm run compile:client
scripts.package: npm run package:server && npm run package:client
scripts.prepare: npm run lint:yaml && npm run convert && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:ts && npm run package
scripts.postinstall: cd pkg/api && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:ts
